message:
Pierre, but NDDP version of course...: https://perchance.org/ai-character-chat?data=Pierre_Gringoire~96b0bbbce0c7e7fcb2a1fc4318a22bf2.gz
IDK what he did IRL aside from the Britannica article about him, but in-book he abandoned his wife in favor of a goat (so he can make money). Stupid, stupid man.
